entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Bloodvein
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:32 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
